title: Women's 2025 Floral Spring Maxi Dress, Summer Long Sleeve V-Neck Empire Waist Dress, Flowy Wedding Guest Dresses
description: COMFORTABLE FABRIC: 2025 Floral Print Dress is made of elegant and lightweight chiffon fabric. The lining feels smooth and cool. Wearing our floral dress in early spring and summer, you will feel cool and comfortable like never before.

OUTLINE YOUR CURVES: This casual long sleeve dress features a classic v-neck and high waist design with a unique elastic waist cinching hem to outline your beautiful curves. Vibrant florals and softly flared sleeves showcase feminine softness and elegance.
WARDROBE MUST HAVE: This flowy empire waist maxi dress is perfect for cold weather, work, a date or dinner. Wear it with heels or flats to instantly elevate your elegance and make it unforgettable.
EASY CARE: This floral maxi dress is easy to care for, machine washable and retains its original shape and detailing with every wash, allowing you to enjoy the flower beauty for years to come.

Galocmo is a new brand that focuses on quality and style. Each piece is designed to be a versatile staple in your wardrobe, easily transitioning from day to night, casual to formal. If you have any questions about the floral maxi dress, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our team is always here to help.
